Text.Name: Boss_Zhulong_NightGod
Text.Desc: Gain 1 layer of [Lunarfrost Breath] every 6 seconds. Only Artifacts and Spells of Yang elements (Fire, Wood) can deal full damage. Artifacts of Earth element can deal a smaller amount of damage. Damage dealt by Artifacts of Yin elements will be absorbed.

Text.Name: Boss_Zhulong_Night
Text.Desc: When Lunarfrost Breath reaches 100 stacks, it will unleash the manifestations of inner demon.

Text.Name: Boss_Zhulong_DayGod
Text.Desc: Gain 1 layer of [Solarflare Breath] every 6 seconds. Only Artifacts and Spells of Yin elements(Metal, Water) can deal full damage. Artifacts of Earth element can deal a smaller amount of damage. Damage dealt by Artifacts of Yang elements will be absorbed.

Text.Name: Boss_Zhulong_Day
Text.Desc: When Solarflare Breath reaches 100 stacks, it will unleash the manifestations of karma force.

Text.Name: Boss_Zhulong_Shennian
Text.Desc: Each layer decreases Mental State by 2. It will be cleared out when the Torch Dragon switches phase.

Text.Name: Boss_Zhulong_Zuinie
Text.Desc: Each layer decreases Condemnation by 2. It will be cleared out when the Torch Dragon switches phase.

Text.Name: Boss_Zhulong_yehuocanshen
Text.Desc: Condemnation is increased by 1000, but permanently decreased by 200 when it ends.

Text.Name: Boss_Zhulong_xinlingzezao
Text.Desc: Mental State is decreased by 100, but permanently increased by 20 when it ends.
